name: Shio: Shoot 'em up Game
description:
Shio is a shoot 'em up game made with Godot for the ENTER NAME STUDIO JAM! #4, where you control a ship that can warp between two worlds to dodge enemy fire!

Controls : 

WASD, Arrow Keys or D-Pad (on controller) for movement.

Space or A (on controller) to shoot.

Shift, E or Y (on controller) to switch between worlds.

Credit :

Music by mousey : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuC5D7cdKwof_688F5yvKdA

Font by Code807 : https://itch.io/queue/c/733269/godot-pixel-fonts?game_id=108450

Sound effects made in jsfxr : https://sfxr.me/ and Chip Tone : https://sfbgames.com/chiptone/

Gamejam : https://itch.io/jam/enter-name-studio-jam-4
